original: 南陽人。與龐統不睦，兩人皆隨劉備攻蜀，後龐統身亡，張存出言不敬，惹怒劉備，被免官。史官也因其人言行不當，作史時不為其立傳。
text: Nanyang people. They were at odds with Pang Tong, and both of them followed Liu Bei to attack Shu. Later Pang Tong died. Zhang Cun spoke disrespectfully and angered Liu Bei and was dismissed. The official historian also did not write a biography for him because of his improper words and deeds.
